2fa_modal.backup_codes: Write these backups codes down in a safe place. They can be used once to login to your account if your 2FA device is unavailable. They will never be displayed again for security.
2fa_modal.secret_codes: Copy secret codes to safe place

from_you.subtitle: Allow a colleague to approve on behalf of you. You will still be notified about pending approvals during delegation.
from_you.title: From you

to_you.subtitle: Approvals delegated to you by other approvers in your organisation.
to_you.title: To you
